> Data visualization is a great tool to explore communicate about your data. Learn the basics of visualizing your data with `ggplot2` and other data vis packages.

## Description
`ggplot` is a popular and powerful package for visualizing data in R. The goal of this lesson is to introduce you to the basic components of working with `ggplot2` and inspire you to keep exploring this package. We also briefly introduce the `leaflet`  and `dt` package as a way to create interactive maps and tables respectively.

## Prerequisites
- Basic knowledge about R and RStudio
- Familiarity with the packages `dyplr` and `tidyr`

## Learning Goals
- Introduce the basics of the `ggplot2` package to create static plots
- Understand how to use `ggplot2`'s theme abilities to create publication-grade graphics
- Learn the basics of the `leaflet` package to create interactive maps

## Duration
2 hours
